answer: You can change your Password in the Profile Section  👉 Account Preferences under Signing & Security ⚙️. Make sure you the password includes special characters (such as & and $) to make it more secure 🔒
answer_formatted: You can change your Password in the Profile Section  👉 Account Preferences under Signing & Security ⚙️. Make sure you the password includes special characters (such as & and $) to make it more secure 🔒
